alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 07 at 7:09PM CST until February 10 at 11:42PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occur from Panama to Arkoma. Some local and county roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 36.0 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
